Page, now 37 and greying. While Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a startup. Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products. He's worth$ 15 billion, but Page remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.

Allen Iverson 's biggest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. "Just get your swagger back," Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him. That's really what James May did. It helped me out. Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds, and Allen Iverson added 31 points to lead the 76ers to a 98-89 win over the James Cleveland Cavaliers on Friday night

the election, he apparently vetoed one of Michael Gove 's proposed special advisers, Dominic Cummings . There was tension with Steve Hilton , too. "They're just chalk and cheese," says one senior Cameroon. Andy Coulson was the measured professional, cautious, a bit more Right-wing. Anti-bullshit, anti-hipster. And Steve Hilton was the opposite. According to one Cabinet minister, the two "complemented" one another, with Steve Hilton providing big, blue-sky ideas about the Tory party and the 21st-century state, while Andy Coulson handled the practical realities of day-to-day

things-help spur faster networks( he sites LTE in particular), support mobile payment initiatives and increase the availability of inexpensive smartphones. Those latter two initiatives he says, are particularly important in the developing world. Phones, as we know, are used as banks in many poorer parts of the world-and modern technology means that their use as financial tools can go much further than that, Eric Schmidt said. As for getting smartphones out there, Eric Schmidt argues Google can have a pretty big impact. "We envision literally a billion people getting inexpensive, browser-based touchscreen phones over the next few years

CRM 2011. Both on-premises and cloud-based versions of the platform will be available in 40 markets and 41 languages starting on 28 February. A 17 January statement by Microsoft chief executive Steve Ballmer emphasised Dynamics CRM's familiar user experience, enabling greater collaboration, streamlining of processes and access to real-time data. Microsoft finds itself locked in a fierce battle for CRM market share with Salesforce.com and Oracle, both of which have shown little hesitation in both updating their products and sniping at their rivals.
